summary: This document is a summary of Jeffrey Epstein's bank account transactions at Deutsche Bank for the month of April 2015. It details various credits and debits, including transfers to and from other banks, checks paid, and account balances throughout the month.

events.title: Beginning of Account Summary
events.description: The account summary begins with a balance of $1,066,306.23.

events.title: End of Account Summary
events.description: The account summary ends with a balance of $1,615,944.70.

events.title: Large Incoming Transfer
events.description: A significant incoming transfer of $2,000,000.00 is recorded on this date.

events.title: Multiple Preauthorized Debits
events.description: Multiple preauthorized debits totaling over $368,000.00 are recorded on this date.

events.title: Outgoing Transfers
events.description: Outgoing transfers totaling $82,000.00 to Wells Fargo Bank and $14,153.75 to another account are recorded.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, B3, Saint Thomas, 00802, United States Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The document details Jeffrey Epstein's account transactions at Deutsche Bank for April 2015.
The account had a beginning balance of $1,066,306.23 and an ending balance of $1,615,944.70.
A significant incoming transfer of $2,000,000.00 occurred on April 16, 2015.
Multiple preauthorized debits totaling over $368,000.00 were recorded on April 14, 2015.
Various transfers were made to banks and entities, including Wells Fargo, SabaDell United Bank, and others.
